member.name: T:ServiceStack.PartialResponse.ServiceModel.DefaultPartialResponseConfig
member.summary: Supports "application/json", "application/jsv, and"text/html" content type with fields passed in via the header "x-fields" and query string "fields".

member.name: T:ServiceStack.PartialResponse.ServiceModel.IPartialResponseConfig
member.summary: Implement this interface to provide custom configuration for partial responses.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.PartialResponse.ServiceModel.IPartialResponseConfig.FieldsHeaderName
member.summary: The name of the custom header for field selectors.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.PartialResponse.ServiceModel.IPartialResponseConfig.FieldsQueryStringName
member.summary: The query string parameter name for the field selectors.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.PartialResponse.ServiceModel.DefaultPartialResponseConfig.SupportedResponseContentType
member.summary: List of content types that are supported for partial responses.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.PartialResponse.ServiceModel.DefaultPartialResponseConfig.FieldResolutionMethod
member.summary: Field selectors are determined by combining the header and query string parameter.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.PartialResponse.ServiceModel.DefaultPartialResponseConfig.FieldsHeaderName
member.summary: Name of the headers that contains the field selectors.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.PartialResponse.ServiceModel.DefaultPartialResponseConfig.FieldsQueryStringName
member.summary: Name of the query string parameter that contains the field selectors.

member.name: T:ServiceStack.PartialResponse.ServiceModel.FieldResolutionMethod
member.summary: Determines where field selectors come from (i.e. query string, header, etc).

member.name: F:ServiceStack.PartialResponse.ServiceModel.FieldResolutionMethod.HeaderOnly
member.summary: Only the header is use to determine field selectors.

member.name: F:ServiceStack.PartialResponse.ServiceModel.FieldResolutionMethod.QueryStringOnly
member.summary: Only the query string parameter is used to determine field selectors.

member.name: F:ServiceStack.PartialResponse.ServiceModel.FieldResolutionMethod.HeaderThenQueryString
member.summary: Uses the header to determine field selectors. If the header is empty, the query string parameter is used.

member.name: F:ServiceStack.PartialResponse.ServiceModel.FieldResolutionMethod.QueryStringThenHeader
member.summary: Uses the query string parameter to determine field selectors. If the query string parameter is empty, the header is used.

member.name: F:ServiceStack.PartialResponse.ServiceModel.FieldResolutionMethod.QueryStringAndHeader
member.summary: Combines field selectors from the query string parameter and header.

member.name: T:ServiceStack.PartialResponse.ServiceModel.PartialResponseExtensions
member.summary: Takes a DTO and returns the appropriate partial response for the given configuration.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.PartialResponse.ServiceModel.PartialResponseExtensions.ToPartialResponse``1(ServiceStack.Web.IRequest,``0)

summary.para: Returns a partial response of the given Dto if fileds are specified in the request context and the content type is supported.

member.param: Dto to process to partial response.

summary.para: Returns a partial response of the given Dto if fileds are specified in the request context and the content type is supported.
Configuration is provided by the caller.
